description: The conclusion object represents the results of detections or analytics.
caption: Conclusion
name: conclusion

caption.description: The short description of the reported conclusion.

created_time.description: The time when the conclusion was created.

desc.description: The description of the reported conclusion.

product_uid.description: The unique identifier of the product that reported the conclusion.

related_events.description: The events associated with the conclusion.

rule.description: The rule that triggered the conclusion.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the reported conclusion.
